text: A bizarre report from top selling US publication Star claims the former Olympian is using sperm she froze during her marriage to Kris Jenner, and getting the woman Kim paid to carry newborn daughter, Chicago, to carry the baby for her. “ Caitlyn thinks she was a bad father because she wasn ’ t living as a woman, her true self, ” a close pal tells the magazine. “ She loves the idea of raising a child as the mother she has always longed to be. Now she thinks she ’ s be a totally different parent. ” However, the Kardashian - Jenner clan are said to be horrified that 68 - year - old Cait is considering giving motherhood a go – especially Kim. “ Kim was furious when Caitlyn reached out to her surrogate, ” continues Star's inside
